Title: b"India's largest private sector bank now allows customers to do their code reviews"
Text:
b'HDFC bank believes in transparency. Their developers therefore offer their online banking service without JS code minification/obfuscation. Not only users can review their Javascript code, they can also see what changes were made, when were they made and who did it - in case you want to reach out to the developers!

PS: Yeah I know it's "just" frontend and can't be exploited easily.

https://preview.redd.it/4fglmfv2p2k61.png?width=2426&format=png&auto=webp&s=949eb57d923054fe753152045cbdfad75a006de4
